# Badge Challenge I {#challegeI}

## Administrative notes

* **Friday 2/28 5pm through Monday 3/2 11:55pm**.
* Self-scheduled Badge Challenge [instructions](http://www.science.smith.edu/self-scheduled-exam-printing/){target="_blank"}. In particular:
    + Only print from macOS computers.
    + At some point you'll need to wait 5-10 seconds for a "paper is held in queue" pop-up box to appear before you can print.
* Exam length:
    + You will be given 140 mins to complete it (including transit time to writing area).
    + Remember that you only have to do as many questions as you are ready for. If a question has multiple parts, you **must** attempt all parts to earn above **X** (cannot be assessed). 
    + **Timestamps will be strictly enforced. Any timestamps indicating than more than 140 minutes are subject to an honor board case.**
    + All Office of Disability Services forms must be submitted before the midterm start time.
* Other details:
    + Closed-book, no internet, and individually completed.
    + Bring colored pencils


## Badges 1-5
    
* Badges: Lectures 1-12 & Labs 1-8. In other words everything up to and including regression with one numerical predictor. 
* What to study:
    + Your hand-written course notes first: they are the "executive summaries" of topics.
    + The material on the course webpage chronologically, in particular the ModernDive readings.
    + Problem sets corresponding to labs.
